text: and invisible martini glasses.

name: alejandroadam
text: I have a very old copy of the very book. it is very entertaining, but you have to give her props. there are several points in the book where she states "this will not make sense in 10 years becuase no one will have servents, or visit 'the point' for a weekend"

name: bookofsand
text: A comment left by bookofsand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, apocowarg, riotdejaneiro, Vondicus, RedMange, thesyndicate88, theplaidknight, Wite_Rabit, holly_golightly, Dallovich)

name: tekende
text: This strip does not need to be saved. It is awesome.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
fixed.
Quote:
This strip does not need to be saved. Up yours if that was actually meant to be an insult.

name: sargasm
text: I think the closing sentence makes it work.  He provides for both possibilities.

name: chaesar
text: BRINGS BACK RAY'S PLACE!

name: ford
text:
I envision this line shouted into a hole by Buffalo Bill:

IT BRINGS BACK RAY'S PLACE! IT BRINGS BACK RAY'S PLACE OR IT GETS THE HOSE AGAIN!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray doesn't know if he's being insulted, so he covers all his bases. Classy.

name: senseihollywood
text: there's another use for those gigantic condoms: storing etiquette books for future reference...

name: connellingus
text: I really liked the way Ray signed off in this one, but the gag really would have worked better as part of Ray's Place, unless this letter was made up to set up the joke and Chris wanted to use only real letters for the column.

name: riazm
text: The etiquette book is Lyle's.

name: tttt
text:
what qualifications does one really need

can you attend advice column college

name: heccibiggs
text: Jesus, what was the question?

name: tekende
text: I want to know this too, but I have a feeling we may never get an answer.

name: atmus
text: I recognize that username for some reason, but I remember nothing about you.  It's as if you've been erased from existence.

name: ibetso
text: Should be rated higher because of "Where to put your fork if the king is over for dinner"... like the King just drops by now and again.

name: honesttom
text: He does. Oh... does he not visit you? Oh. You're THAT guy. He talks about you. Probably shouldn't tell you what he said.

text:
Ray wouldn't drink while doing his job.

Have you forgotten that he has mad respect for the internet?

name: swatson
text: My bad. :(

text:

name: highfeverblues
text: If I ever found a book in this manner; I would feel obliged to read it of course.

name: kalethan
text: prolly 'cause the text is so small, but no-one's mentioned the italicized 'before' in the 6th panel...how to instruct the maid how to fold... "My mate's invented one that shits itself...brilliant, really"

name: rayonatoilet
text: The last panel has the most exact "Fun to quote" versus "dangerous if the people you're quoting to don't read achewood" balance.
